name: Job Salary Data
description: Extremely Fast and Simple API to get Job Salary/Pay Estimations from all major publishers - Payscale, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter and many others, all in a single API.

api_methods.name: Job Salary
api_methods.description: Get estimated job salaries/pay by job title and location.

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: Job title for which to get salary estimation

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Free-text location/area in which to get salary estimation

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description:
Search radius in km (measured from *location*).
Default: `200`.
